data.title: Peter Schiff Says Michael Saylor Strategy-Bitcoin Model Is 'Fraud' And MSTR Is 'Broken'
data.description: Peter Schiff has cast doubt on Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and Strategy (NASDAQ:MSTR), accusing Michael Saylor of running an unsustainable business model that he argues looks increasingly like a "fraud." What Happened: In a new X post, Schiff claimed ...
data.keywords: Michael Saylor, Peter Schiff, Strategy, Jeff Bezos, business model, Bitcoin, preferred shares
